content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Based on your position at EPAM, you have been selected to participate in EPAM's Compliance Program Training. As you may recall from Ark's introductory email welcoming Philip Storm, our Chief Compliance Officer, in June of this year, EPAM is committed to strengthening compliance, and this effort is an essential and daily job for each of us. The key topics to be covered in the training
